name: AC-CENT® NON SANDED
description: AC-CENT® NON SANDED Grout is a professional grade, scientifically polymer modified, portland cement colored grout available in the industry. AC-CENT®’s unique blend of portland cement, specially graded mineral filler, powdered latex modifiers and colorfast pigments provides for a superior grout with excellent flexural and bond strength, color control, minimal eorescence and high compressive strength. Because AC-CENT® NONSANDED Grout is protected by AMT, it resists bacteria mold and fungus and associated bacterial stains.
